SELECT AFF_NAME, REC_FIELD_NAME, REC_NOTI_TITLE, write_date, APP_USER_NO, APP_USER_NAME, career_div_code, countAll, countPass, step_item_code, rec_res_code, ENABLE_TF, NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT AF.AFF_NAME, RF.REC_FIELD_NAME, RN.REC_NOTI_TITLE, TO_CHAR (AU.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS write_date, AU.APP_USER_NO, AU.APP_USER_NAME, A.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS career_div_code, CNTALL.CNT AS countAll, NVL( (SELECT COUNT(AD.ADMIN_ID) FROM ADMIN AD, CHECK_RES CR WHERE AD.ADMIN_ID=CR.ADMIN_ID AND CR.APP_USER_NO = AU.APP_USER_NO AND (SELECT DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = CHECK_RES_CODE) = '합격' GROUP BY AU.APP_USER_NO), 0) AS countPass, B.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS step_item_code, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS rec_res_code, RS.ENABLE_TF, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AU.APP_USER_NAME ASC) AS NUM FROM AFF AF, REC_FIELD RF, APP_USER AU, REC_NOTI RN, REC_RES RR, REC_SCH RS, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'CAREER_DIV') A, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'STEP_ITEM') B, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'REC_RES') C, ( SELECT COUNT (AD.ADMIN_ID) AS CNT, AU.APP_USER_NO FROM ADMIN AD, CHECK_RES CR, APP_USER AU WHERE AD.ADMIN_ID = CR.ADMIN_ID AND CR.APP_USER_NO = AU.APP_USER_NO GROUP BY AU.APP_USER_NO) CNTALL
WHERE RN.REC_NOTI_NO = AU.REC_NOTI_NO AND AF.AFF_NO = RF.AFF_NO AND RF.REC_FIELD_NO = RN.REC_FIELD_NO AND AU.APP_USER_NO = RR.APP_USER_NO AND RR.APP_USER_NO = RS.APP_USER_NO AND RN.CAREER_DIV_CODE = A.DETAIL_CODE AND RR.REC_STEP_ITEM_CODE = B.DETAIL_CODE AND RR.REC_RES_CODE = C.DETAIL_CODE AND AU.APP_USER_NO = CNTALL.APP_USER_NO )S )A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex# ORDER BY APP_USER_NAME

SELECT AFF_NAME, REC_FIELD_NAME, REC_NOTI_TITLE, write_date, APP_USER_NO, APP_USER_NAME, career_div_code, countAll, countPass, step_item_code, rec_res_code, ENABLE_TF, NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT AF.AFF_NAME, RF.REC_FIELD_NAME, RN.REC_NOTI_TITLE, TO_CHAR (AU.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS write_date, AU.APP_USER_NO, AU.APP_USER_NAME, A.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS career_div_code, CNTALL.CNT AS countAll, NVL( (SELECT COUNT(AD.ADMIN_ID) FROM ADMIN AD, CHECK_RES CR WHERE AD.ADMIN_ID=CR.ADMIN_ID AND CR.APP_USER_NO = AU.APP_USER_NO AND (SELECT DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = CHECK_RES_CODE) = '합격' GROUP BY AU.APP_USER_NO), 0) AS countPass, B.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS step_item_code, C.DETAIL_CODE_NAME AS rec_res_code, RS.ENABLE_TF, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AU.APP_USER_NAME ASC) AS NUM FROM AFF AF, REC_FIELD RF, APP_USER AU, REC_NOTI RN, REC_RES RR, REC_SCH RS, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'CAREER_DIV') A, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'STEP_ITEM') B, (SELECT DETAIL_CODE, DETAIL_CODE_NAME FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'REC_RES') C, ( SELECT COUNT (AD.ADMIN_ID) AS CNT, AU.APP_USER_NO FROM ADMIN AD, CHECK_RES CR, APP_USER AU WHERE AD.ADMIN_ID = CR.ADMIN_ID AND CR.APP_USER_NO = AU.APP_USER_NO GROUP BY AU.APP_USER_NO) CNTALL
WHERE RN.REC_NOTI_NO = AU.REC_NOTI_NO AND AF.AFF_NO = RF.AFF_NO AND RF.REC_FIELD_NO = RN.REC_FIELD_NO AND AU.APP_USER_NO = RR.APP_USER_NO AND RR.APP_USER_NO = RS.APP_USER_NO AND RN.CAREER_DIV_CODE = A.DETAIL_CODE AND RR.REC_STEP_ITEM_CODE = B.DETAIL_CODE AND RR.REC_RES_CODE = C.DETAIL_CODE AND AU.APP_USER_NO = CNTALL.APP_USER_NO )S )A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
AND APP_USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#app_user_name#||'%'
AND (SELECT DETAIL_CODE FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = CAREER_DIV_CODE) = #career_div_code#
AND (SELECT DETAIL_CODE FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = REC_STEP_ITEM_CODE) = #rec_step_code#
AND (SELECT DETAIL_CODE FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE DETAIL_CODE = REC_RES_CODE) = #rec_res_code#
AND REC_NOTI_TITLE = #rec_noti_title#
AND ENABLE_TF = 'T'
AND ENABLE_TF IN ('F', NULL)
AND REC_FIELD_NAME
#recFieldList[]#
AND to_char(au.write_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN #start_date# AND #end_date#
ORDER BY APP_USER_NAME
